scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deleteobjectsins3 && npm run copytos3
scripts.x: aws s3 sync dist/clap-app s3://clap-app-angular --cache-control max-age=86400,public --region eu-west-1 --delete
scripts.z: aws s3 cp s3://clap-app-angular/index.html s3://clap-app-angular/index.html --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/html
scripts.f: aws s3 cp s3://clap-app-angular/ngsw-worker.js s3://clap-app-angular/ngsw-worker.js --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/javascript
scripts.v: aws s3 cp s3://clap-app-angular/ngsw.json s3://clap-app-angular/ngsw.json --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type application/json
scripts.sync-to-s3: npm run x && npm run z && npm run s && npm run f && npm run v
